metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11095 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The decompileJUMP function in decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8 mishandles cases where the header indicates a file size greater than the actual size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentation fault and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ming package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
